body:
#### PR description:

Modify run21 tracker flatplus05percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials

title: Run3-trk09C Modify run21 tracker flatplus05percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials
